DOC.brief_summary: This is an 80-week extension to a study to assess the safety and effectiveness of vildagliptin, an unapproved drug, compared to rosiglitazone in lowering overall blood glucose levels in people with type 2 diabetes who have not previously been treated with drug therapy to lower their blood sugar. The purpose of the extension study is to gather data on the long-term safety and effectiveness of vildagliptin in people with type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Extension to a Study on the Efficacy and Safety of Vildagliptin Compared to Rosiglitazone in Drug Naive Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Only patients successfully completing study CLAF237A2327 are eligible Written informed consent Ability to comply with all study requirements Premature discontinuation from study CLAF237A2327 Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply
